name: Wheel Circus
description:
Wheel Circus is a Game made for Brackeys Game jam 2020.2

Spin the wheel with controls Left Arrow for Anticlockwise and Right Arrow for Clockwise, you can substitute with Keys A and D.

Avoid the obstacles hitting the targets moving on your wheel until the time counts down

Credits : 

Music -

Jingle circus music, stereo, 24 bit/48 kHz, -3 dB, 00:10,2, produced 2018, with Steinberg Cubase 8.5 and EastWest Hollywood Orchestra

Link - https://freesound.org/people/Jay_You/sounds/460425/

Intro Music - https://freesound.org/people/Robinhood76/sounds/179055/
